item.title: Wetterdatenanalyse
item.description: Via the package owmr from the open weather map we now get a record with 40 entries for Kiel. The entries show the weather data at a distance of 3h each in the future. ## List of 1 ## $ :'data.frame': 1 obs. of 4 variables: ## ..$ id : int 800 ## ..$ main : chr "Clear" ## ..$ description: chr "clear sky" ## ..$ icon : chr "01n" As we see here, the exciting values are still hidden in a list within the dataframe.
